question:
You are having a party and want to invite your friend from a different city.
Write letter to your friend. In your letter:
—Describe why are you having a party
—Give directions on how to get to the venue
—suggest how you can accommodate him/her
Write at least 150 words. You do not need to write any addresses
text: How are you doing? I hope you are doing well since it’s been over a year since we met last time. You will be happy to know that I have cleared my IELTS exam with flying colours and I am inviting you to the celebration party for this success in my life.

The venue for the party will be our residence in Noida on June 30th. We live in a society in Sector 46, which is nearby the Golf course metro station, and you can easily take a cab from there and it hardly takes 10 minutes to reach our place from there. I wish that you come for at least 2-3 days since we have not had the chance to meet after our graduation. You need not worry about your stay as I have made all the arrangements for your accommodation at our place.
I assure you that we will have a great time together. Hoping to see you soon!
